text: Owen H.M. Smith is an American television producer, writer, actor and comedian. Smith has written for such television series as Black-ish, Survivor's Remorse, The Arsenio Hall Show, The Nightly Show with Larry Wilmore and Whitney and acted on such series as Everybody Hates Chris. As a comedian he has performed Stand-up on Conan and The Late Show with Stephen Colbert. Smith also co-hosted the podcast called "Alias Smith and LeRoi" with comedian Ali LeRoi. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:African-American male actors Category:African- American television directors Category:American film producers Category:American male screenwriters Category:American male television actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:American male television writers Category:American men podcasters Category:American podcasters Category:American stand-up comedians Category:21st-century American comedians Category:21st-century American screenwriters
title: Owen H.M. Smith
